solution_line_template: Peter is {peter_candles} years old because he has {peter_candles} birthday candles on his cake.

Rupert is {rupert_age_factor} times older than Peter so Rupert will have {rupert_age_factor}*{peter_candles} = <<{rupert_age_factor}*{peter_candles}={rupert_candles}>>{rupert_candles} candles on his cake.
